column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " Tarrlok 's playing you and I do n't want to see you get hurt . "
#Text=Lin says : " I know what I am doing and the risks that come with it . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " In that case , I 'm going to be by your side during the match . "
#Text=Lin says : " You do n't need to babysit me . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " It 's for Korra .
#Text=It 's not like I 've ever been able to stop you before .
#Text=" Korra says : " Excuse me , Chief Beifong .
#Text=I wanted to thank you for your help , it ... really ... means a lot ... What is her deal ?
#Text=Even when she 's on my side , she 's against me !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 've known Lin since we were children , she 's always been ... challenging .
#Text=" Korra says : " What did your father do to make her hate the Avatar so much ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " My father and Lin got along famously .
#Text=I 'm afraid her issues ... are with me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait a second ... it all makes sense now !
#Text=You and Beifong , Beifong and you .
#Text=You two were a couple !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What !
#Text=How - ?
#Text=Where 'd you get that idea ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Ha !
#Text=Your wife .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Criminy !
#Text=I 'll have to have a word with her .
#Text=" Korra says : " So ... Pema stole you from Beifong .
#Text=I 'm surprised our " esteemed Chief of Police " did n't throw her in jail .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Oh , she tried .
#Text=Anyway , Pema did n't steal me , Lin and I had been growing apart for some time .
#Text=We both had different goals in li - Why am I even telling you this ?
#Text=It all happened a long time ago and we 've moved passed it .
#Text=" Korra says : " Hm , apparently Beifong has n't .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What do you ... Of course she has !
#Text=Anyway , this is none of your business !
#Text=" Korra says : " See you at home , Mr. Heartbreaker !
#Text="
